Articles.Content:
Hello everyone this is John and I'm posting on the Kerbal Space Program Forums!

I've only been playing since version 0.23.5 and the Asteroid Redirect Mission. It's amazing to see how far the game has come in even that short time.

In KSP I've landed on and returned from Mun, Minmus and Duna. I've orbited Eve but am still scared to land.

I pretty much always play with mods. At the very least I always use FAR.
Greetings!. Don't be scared to land on Eve. If you see explosions it means win!
What's up John! Good luck landing and returning from Eve and further bodies. I'm working on that too. And good luck doing it with FAR! It is a magical mod.
I think I want to do something like what Scott Manley just did. Nuclear reactor space plane landing and return. But with more ladders
